title: If  we are going to allow autofill to continue to exist.....
body:
Can we please not allow JG to be a possible autofilled role? The role is way too complex and different from the others. The differnce between a jungle main and a person who only has a possible handful of jg games is clear as day...especially as you climb. You can work with an autofilled mid bc several champs in other lanes can go mid and function, top is the least influential role atm (lets be honest), adc can also b a bit problematic, but if you have a good support, you can at least get through laning phase. Support is to be expected as its the least popular role (might not be anymore, not sure), but, and I might get a lot of feedback from this, support is not as difficult to play as top plus most people would probably agree that if someone had to get autofilled, they'd rather it be support.

But Jungle, a good or bad jungle can EASILY decide the game not to mention, the map awareness, macroplay, pathing, and decision making that jungle requres on a much higher level than any other role. It is almost a guaranteed loss if your jungle is autofilled.
